NewsArticle.Title: Goblin War
NewsArticle.Content: Goblin War The Goblins have declared war on the Aislings. They have gathered in a grass field near Loures. The Mundanes request that all experienced aislings ((level 85+)), who are willing to fight, enlist at Base Camp. Captain Dealos will lead the battle. Spoils of war will be given to Aislings who complete the battle.
